divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side my residence in the driveway grassy areas walking my little dog and looking east observed a glowing obect which may could have been 2 planets very close to on another. THey glowed and were right ontop one another nearly appearing as if it might be eclipsing. The obkect reamined stationary and appeared to stay there even after I had left to go inside. Nothing else remarkable except the glowing like a fire but it did never move.The sky was clear with a lot of stars and the moon was not present.it apppeared in North star area, or @ the Big Dipper. I could not be sure.
